summary: I OWN AN OLDS BRAVADA 2002.  ON MAY 2, 2002 THE ENGINE STOPPED WHILE GOING 60 MPH FOR NO REASON.  THIS IS THE FOURTH TIME THAT THIS HAS HAPPENED.  TWICE I DID NOT TAKE INTO DEALERSHIP.  AFTER .5 TO 1 HOUR THE CAR RESTARTED.  THIS IS A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION AND IT IS A MATTER OF TIME BEFORE SOMEONE IS SERIOUSLY INJURED. OLDS AND THE DEALERSHIP ARE NOT OWNING UP TO THEIR RESPONSIBILITY IN PROVIDING A SAFE AUTOMOBILE. *JB
